channel.title: CVE Feed for wbcomdesigns -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wbcomdesigns -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5489|2024-08-01T21:11:12.790Z -- wbcomdesigns -- wbcom%20designs%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20font%20uploader
item.description: The Wbcom Designs – Custom Font Uploader plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the 'cfu_delete_customfont' function in all versions up to, and including, 2.3.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to delete any custom font.
